original_title: Tödliche Wildnis – Sie waren jung und mussten sterben
overview: Six students go to the Baltic island of Nordström with their archeology professor. The island has it all: after the geologist Berger has sunk into the moor with her only cell phone, one after the other blesses the temporal. What's going on here? Everyone suspects everyone ...
title: Tödliche Wildnis – Sie waren jung und mussten sterben
